channel.title: Projects on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Introduction

item.title: Google Summer of Code
item.description: Sometimes I take picture Created two new modules, the Feedback Sharing Module to provide a brief feedback of the images uploaded, and the Quiz module for users who have a high percentage of their uploads deleted. Both modules were included in the v2.8 release of the Wikimedia Commons App. They can currently be accessed by going to the Settings and opting in as a Beta Tester of these new features.

item.description: Sometimes I take picture Created two new modules, the Feedback Sharing Module to provide a brief feedback of the images uploaded, and the Quiz module for users who have a high percentage of their uploads deleted. item.title: ChatBot
item.description: Chatbots are often used online and in messaging apps, but are also now included in many operating systems as intelligent virtual assistants, such as Siri for Apple products and Cortana for Windows. Dedicated chatbot appliances are also becoming increasingly common, such as Amazonâ€™s Alexa. These chatbots can perform a wide variety of functions based on user commands. Non-goal-oriented dialogue systems (chatbots) are an interesting test-bed for interactive Natural Language Processing (NLP) systems and are also directly useful in a wide range of applications ranging from technical support services to entertainment.
